name: Seducer Dog
description:
It's mating season and so far it's not looking good for ya buddy. But there is still hope as you see one female approach you. Remember all the advices from your seduction gurus and block her path!

Try to mirror her moves so she can't escape!

Gameplay Instructions
Controls (Mobile and Gamepad):
Left Thumbstick: Shift Weight of Dog
Snap Left and Right Thumbstick back (bascially move both sticks down, then let go): BackwardJump
